name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.datanode.failed.volumes.tolerated
description:
The number of volumes that are allowed to
  fail before a datanode stops offering service. By default
  any volume failure will cause a datanode to shutdown.
  The value should be greater than or equal to -1 , -1 represents minimum
  1 valid volume.

name: dfs.datanode.block.id.layout.upgrade.threads
description:
The number of threads to use when creating hard links from
    current to previous blocks during upgrade of a DataNode to block ID-based
    block layout (see HDFS-6482 for details on the layout).

name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.fetch.retry.interval-ms
description:
Time of interval that fetcher retry to fetch again when some
  non-fatal failure happens because of some events like NM restart.

name: dfs.provided.aliasmap.load.retries
description:
The number of retries on the Datanode to load the provided aliasmap;
      defaults to 0.

name: dfs.datanode.lock-reporting-threshold-ms
description:
When thread waits to obtain a lock, or a thread holds a lock for
    more than the threshold, a log message will be written. Note that
    dfs.lock.suppress.warning.interval ensures a single log message is
    emitted per interval for waiting threads and a single message for holding
    threads to avoid excessive logging.
